name: Fabletics VIP
risk_reason: Users make one-off sportswear purchases. Only VIP membership prices are valid.

name: Amazon Prime
risk_reason: Users make daily one-off purchases here. Only exact price matches confirm a sub.

name: Walmart+
risk_reason: Indistinguishable from grocery bills except by price.

name: Uber One
risk_reason: Often confused with a standard ride or meal cost.

name: YouTube Premium
risk_reason: Confused with movie rentals or Superchats.

name: YouTube TV
risk_reason: Price varies with add-ons. Anything over $50 is likely YouTube TV.

name: Xbox Game Pass
risk_reason: Confused with game purchases or Office 365.

name: Apple One / Services
risk_reason: Apple bundles everything under 'apple.com/bill'. Only price identifies the service.

name: Disney Bundle
risk_reason: Usually distinct, but bundle pricing varies.

name: Planet Fitness
risk_reason: Annual fees and signup fees appear randomly.
